name: Hell Run (anigvit, Kei2Lee, WSAL Evan, horacv, Ashley Cho)
name_original: Hell Run (anigvit, Kei2Lee, WSAL Evan, horacv, Ashley Cho)
description:
You’re a pious Christian. One day you declared that you don’t fear Satan. In the blink of an eye, you found yourself in the last circle of hell. It’s freezing here.

To say that Satan was displeased would be an understatement. He wants you to get out… NOW!

FEATURES:

  • Enjoy the thrill of jumping over the void.
  • Solve hellish puzzles on your way out.
  • Run fast because Satan is on your heels.
  • Become more powerful every time you die!
  • Though keep in mind that Satan grants favors once in eternity.
  • Challenge yourself to beat the game with less attempts.

CREDITS:

Art: KazumaSei and RCruji

Music Composer: Kei2 Lee

Technical Audio Designer: Horacio Valdivieso (horacio@abovenoisestudios.com)

Design: anigvit, Ashley Cho, KazumaSei, RCruji, WSAL Evan

Programming: Ashley Cho, WSAL Evan

Writing & Story: anigvit
